about.title: About
about.pageDescription: A software engineer who loves creating, dedicated to solving problems with technology
about.intro1: Beyond the rational logic of code, I prioritize how technology serves people. I believe that excellent software requires not only a robust technical architecture but also a deep understanding of user needs.
about.intro2: As a freelance engineer, I possess
about.intro2Part2: to solve complex system problems. I also bring
about.intro2Part3: , enabling me to discuss project details in clear, accessible language. I am not just an executor, but a trustworthy partner.
about.intro3: I value every interaction with my partners. Whether it's initial project brainstorming or detailed discussions during development, I collaborate with the utmost rigor to polish and deliver high-quality work.
about.skillsDescription: My tech stack can handle various development needs

faqs.q1: How long does project development take?
faqs.a1: Development time depends on project complexity. A typical corporate website takes about 4-6 weeks, while more complex e-commerce or custom systems may take 2-4 months. I will provide a detailed schedule before the project starts.
faqs.a2: We typically use installment payments: 30% deposit upon signing, 40% at mid-development, and 30% upon project completion. Payment terms can be flexibly adjusted based on project needs.
faqs.q3: Do you provide maintenance after completion?
faqs.a3: Yes, all projects include a free maintenance period. After the maintenance period ends, you can choose to renew maintenance services to ensure your website remains stable and receives technical support.
faqs.q4: Can I see the design before deciding?
faqs.a4: Before formal development, I will provide website architecture planning and design drafts for your confirmation. Development only begins after the design direction meets your expectations, giving you peace of mind.

contact.title: Contact

contact.infoDescription: I value every aspect of the project and your ideas. through clear and rational communication, I help you clarify requirements and find the best solution. Feel free to add me on Line to discuss your project.
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! I will reply soon.
